Description: A simple brush-based trigger which triggers its target once when a players enters it - never a second time. The entity deletes itself from the game regardless if it successfully fires it's target or not. For reusable version, use [trigger_multiple](../trigger_multiple).

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set name of {{ entname }}. Can be kill-targeted.
Entity to trigger when {{ entname }} is touched (or when stop touched if "Fire On Exit" flag is selected).
Entity to remove when {{ entname }} is touched (or when stop touched if "Fire On Exit" flag is selected).

Issues: Monsters are only able to trigger brush trigger entities while moving inside of them.
